scenes.sceneText: All of you fennel has run off again, go find it in the many rooms of ludicrously close together biomes!
The bog of unquenchable of thirst. It has some fennel and will give it to you.
You have now entered the desert of desserts. Sticky icing layers the floor.
The sea of c's is filled with all forms of life that start with c, such as cuddlefish, cameleons, camels, capybaras, and coalas.
You are now in space. Drifting by you is two alternative-punk aliens, someone's cover letter, and a British discount store. Space is too weird.
Congratulations! You found all of your fennel! Now where'd did I put all the millet...
